alert.note: Alert for Madison (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 13 at 6:55PM CDT until April 13 at 7:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 730 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL MADISON COUNTY... At 655 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles north of Annandale, or 7 miles west of Canton, moving northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Canton around 700 PM CDT. Way around 710 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 1000 PM CDT for central Mississippi. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
